channel.title: Kicking at certain words?
channel.description: I want to know how to make it so if people say a certain word, they get kicked automatically. Thank you. I'm using Allstarscape v2 (well, actually, it's reaperscape v3, but it's just an edited allstarscape)

item.title: Kicking at certain words?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Every client has a perfectly good censor built in. You just have to enable it.

Read full topic

item.title: Kicking at certain words?
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

go to your client’s folder and open client.java
Search for this code:

private int anInt822;
now under that add this line

public boolean loggedIn;
public String censor2 = "";
public boolean censor = true;
public String badWords[] = {"BAD Word 1", "BAD Word 2", "BAD Word 3", "BAD Word 4"};

so the whole code should look like this:

private int anInt822;
public boolean loggedIn;
public String censor2 = "";
public boolean censor = true;
public String badWords[] = {"BAD Word 1", "BAD Word 2", "BAD Word 3", "BAD Word 4"};

please let me know how it goes. also post any errors.

Read full topic
